name: dracut
description:
dracut is used to create an initramfs image by copying tools and files
from an installed system and combining it with the dracut framework.

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: kmod
dependencies.description:
kmod is a set of tools to handle common tasks with Linux kernel modules
like insert, remove, list, check properties, resolve dependencies and
aliases.
